amendment.description: To provide for the reporting requirement regarding Iraq to include a requirement to report noncompetitive contracting for the reconstruction of the infrastructure of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 793 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S6834-6835; text: CR S6834) To provide for the reporting requirement regarding Iraq to include a requirement to report noncompetitive contracting for the reconstruction of the infrastructure of Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 793 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
